Method Detail

isDebugging

public static boolean isDebugging(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)

setDebugging

public static void setDebugging(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                                boolean value)
Enable debugging for all loggers. This basically sets all parentHandlers to a lower log level to ensure that messages are correctly logged. All newly created and existing loggers will also have debugging enabled.

public boolean isDebugging()
Check to see if the logger is logging debug messages.

Returns:
isDebugging true if it is logging debug messages, false otherwise.
